20101202232006.000|20101202232007.667|CCO|TESTIFIED TO THIS SENTIMENT, I 
20101202232007.667|20101202232009.333|CCO|ALSO SAID THAT I BELIEVE THAT

20101202232014.333|20101202232016.000|CCO|FACT.
20101202232016.000|20101202232017.667|CCO|NOW I DO.
20101202232017.667|20101202232019.333|CCO|AND SO WHAT WAS MY PERSONAL
